imports.value: FontId, GlyphPositioner, GlyphChange, rusttype, SectionGeometry, FontMap, Layout, Color, BuiltInLineBreaker, SectionText

defs.docs:
```
 use glyph_brush::{BrushAction, BrushError, GlyphBrushBuilder, Section};

defs.name: GlyphBrushBuilder
defs.value: GlyphBrushBuilder { font_data, initial_cache_size, gpu_cache_scale_tolerance, gpu_cache_position_tolerance, gpu_cache_align_4x4, cache_glyph_positioning, cache_glyph_drawing, section_hasher }
defs.docs: Builder for a [`GlyphBrush`](struct.GlyphBrush.html).

defs.name: using_font_bytes
defs.docs:
Specifies the default font data used to render glyphs.
 Referenced with `FontId(0)`, which is default.

defs.name: using_font
defs.docs:
Specifies the default font used to render glyphs.
 Referenced with `FontId(0)`, which is default.

defs.name: add_font_bytes
defs.docs:
Adds additional fonts to the one added in [`using_font`](#method.using_font) /
 [`using_font_bytes`](#method.using_font_bytes).
 Returns a [`FontId`](struct.FontId.html) to reference this font.

defs.name: add_font
defs.docs:
Adds additional fonts to the one added in [`using_font`](#method.using_font) /
 [`using_font_bytes`](#method.using_font_bytes).
 Returns a [`FontId`](struct.FontId.html) to reference this font.

defs.name: initial_cache_size
defs.docs:
Initial size of 2D texture used as a gpu cache, pixels (width, height).
 The GPU cache will dynamically quadruple in size whenever the current size
 is insufficient.

defs.name: gpu_cache_scale_tolerance
defs.docs:
Sets the maximum allowed difference in scale used for judging whether to reuse an
 existing glyph in the GPU cache.

defs.name: gpu_cache_position_tolerance
defs.docs:
Sets the maximum allowed difference in subpixel position used for judging whether
 to reuse an existing glyph in the GPU cache. Anything greater than or equal to
 1.0 means "don't care".

defs.name: gpu_cache_align_4x4
defs.docs: Align glyphs in texture cache to 4x4 texel boundaries.

defs.name: cache_glyph_positioning
defs.docs:
Sets whether perform the calculation of glyph positioning according to the layout
 every time, or use a cached result if the input `Section` and `GlyphPositioner` are the
 same hash as a previous call.

defs.name: cache_glyph_drawing
defs.docs: Sets optimising drawing by reusing the last draw requesting an identical draw queue.

defs.name: section_hasher
defs.docs:
Sets the section hasher. `GlyphBrush` cannot handle absolute section hash collisions
 so use a good hash algorithm.

defs.name: build
defs.docs: Builds a `GlyphBrush` using the input gfx factory

defs.name: GlyphBrush
defs.docs:
Object allowing glyph drawing, containing cache state. Manages glyph positioning cacheing,
 glyph draw caching & efficient GPU texture cache updating.

defs.name: queue_custom_layout
defs.value: fn <'a, S, G> (&mut self, section: S, custom_layout: &G) -> ()
defs.docs:
Queues a section/layout to be processed by the next call of
 [`process_queued`](struct.GlyphBrush.html#method.process_queued). Can be called multiple
 times to queue multiple sections for drawing.

defs.name: queue
defs.docs:
Queues a section/layout to be processed by the next call of
 [`process_queued`](struct.GlyphBrush.html#method.process_queued). Can be called multiple
 times to queue multiple sections for drawing.

defs.name: queue_pre_positioned
defs.value: fn (&mut self, glyphs: Vec<(PositionedGlyph<'font>, Color, FontId)>, bounds: Rect<f32>, z: f32) -> ()
defs.docs:
Queues pre-positioned glyphs to be processed by the next call of
 [`process_queued`](struct.GlyphBrush.html#method.process_queued). Can be called multiple
 times.

defs.name: process_queued
defs.value: fn <F1, F2> (&mut self, update_texture: F1, to_vertex: F2) -> Result<BrushAction<V>, BrushError>
defs.docs:
Processes all queued sections, calling texture update logic when necessary &
 returning a `BrushAction`.
 See [`queue`](struct.GlyphBrush.html#method.queue).

defs.name: resize_texture
defs.value: fn (&mut self, new_width: u32, new_height: u32) -> ()
defs.docs: Rebuilds the logical texture cache with new dimensions. Should be avoided if possible.

defs.name: texture_dimensions
defs.docs: Returns the logical texture cache pixel dimensions `(width, height)`.

defs.name: add_font_bytes
defs.value: fn <'a, B> (&mut self, font_data: B) -> FontId
defs.docs: Adds an additional font to the one(s) initially added on build.

defs.name: add_font
defs.docs: Adds an additional font to the one(s) initially added on build.

defs.name: keep_cached_custom_layout
defs.value: fn <'a, S, G> (&mut self, section: S, custom_layout: &G) -> ()
defs.docs: Retains the section in the cache as if it had been used in the last draw-frame.

defs.name: keep_cached
defs.docs: Retains the section in the cache as if it had been used in the last draw-frame.

defs.name: GlyphVertex
defs.value: GlyphVertex { tex_coords, pixel_coords, bounds, color, z }
defs.docs: Data used to generate vertex information for a single glyph

defs.name: Draw
defs.docs: Draw new/changed vertix data.

defs.name: ReDraw
defs.docs: Re-draw last frame's vertices unmodified.

defs.name: BrushAction
defs.docs: Actions that should be taken after processing queue data

defs.name: TextureTooSmall
defs.docs: Texture is too small to cache queued glyphs

defs.name: PositionedGlyphIter
defs.docs: [`PositionedGlyph`](struct.PositionedGlyph.html) iterator.

defs.name: GlyphCruncher
defs.docs: Common glyph layout logic.

defs.name: pixel_bounds_custom_layout
defs.value: fn <'a, S, L> (&mut self, section: S, custom_layout: &L) -> Option<Rect<i32>>
defs.docs:
Returns the pixel bounding box for the input section using a custom layout.
 The box is a conservative whole number pixel rectangle that can contain the section.

defs.name: pixel_bounds
defs.value: fn <'a, S> (&mut self, section: S) -> Option<Rect<i32>>
defs.docs:
Returns the pixel bounding box for the input section. The box is a conservative
 whole number pixel rectangle that can contain the section.

defs.name: glyphs_custom_layout
defs.value: fn <'a, 'b, S, L> (&'b mut self, section: S, custom_layout: &L) -> PositionedGlyphIter<'b, 'font>
defs.docs: Returns an iterator over the `PositionedGlyph`s of the given section with a custom layout.

defs.name: glyphs
defs.value: fn <'a, 'b, S> (&'b mut self, section: S) -> PositionedGlyphIter<'b, 'font>
defs.docs: Returns an iterator over the `PositionedGlyph`s of the given section.

defs.name: fonts
defs.docs: Returns the available fonts.

defs.name: glyph_bounds_custom_layout
defs.value: fn <'a, S, L> (&mut self, section: S, custom_layout: &L) -> Option<Rect<f32>>
defs.docs:
Returns a bounding box for the section glyphs calculated using each glyph's
 vertical & horizontal metrics.

defs.name: glyph_bounds
defs.value: fn <'a, S> (&mut self, section: S) -> Option<Rect<f32>>
defs.docs:
Returns a bounding box for the section glyphs calculated using each glyph's
 vertical & horizontal metrics.

defs.name: GlyphCalculator
defs.docs:
Cut down version of a [`GlyphBrush`](struct.GlyphBrush.html) that can calculate pixel bounds,
 but is unable to actually render anything.

defs.name: fonts
defs.docs: Returns the available fonts.

defs.docs: [`GlyphCalculator`](struct.GlyphCalculator.html) scoped cache lock.

defs.name: GlyphCalculatorBuilder
defs.docs: Builder for a [`GlyphCalculator`](struct.GlyphCalculator.html).

Adds additional fonts to the one added in [`using_font`](#method.using_font) /

Sets the section hasher. `GlyphCalculator` cannot handle absolute section hash collisions
 so use a good hash algorithm.

defs.name: OwnedVariedSection
defs.value: OwnedVariedSection { screen_position, bounds, z, layout, text }

defs.name: screen_position
defs.docs: Position on screen to render text, in pixels from top-left. Defaults to (0, 0).

defs.name: bounds
defs.docs: Max (width, height) bounds, in pixels from top-left. Defaults to unbounded.

defs.name: z
defs.docs: Z values for use in depth testing. Defaults to 0.0

defs.name: layout
defs.docs:
Built in layout, can be overridden with custom layout logic
 see [`queue_custom_layout`](struct.GlyphBrush.html#method.queue_custom_layout)

defs.name: text
defs.docs: Text to render, rendered next to one another according the layout.

defs.name: text
defs.docs: Text to render

defs.name: scale
defs.docs: Position on screen to render text, in pixels from top-left. Defaults to (0, 0).

defs.name: color
defs.docs: Rgba color of rendered text. Defaults to black.

defs.name: font_id
defs.docs: Font id to use for this section.

defs.name: VariedSection
defs.value: VariedSection { screen_position, bounds, z, layout, text }
defs.docs:
An object that contains all the info to render a varied section of text. That is one including
 many parts with differing fonts/scales/colors bowing to a single layout.

defs.name: screen_position
defs.docs: Position on screen to render text, in pixels from top-left. Defaults to (0, 0).

defs.name: bounds
defs.docs: Max (width, height) bounds, in pixels from top-left. Defaults to unbounded.

defs.name: z
defs.docs: Z values for use in depth testing. Defaults to 0.0

defs.name: layout
defs.docs:
Built in layout, can be overridden with custom layout logic
 see [`queue_custom_layout`](struct.GlyphBrush.html#method.queue_custom_layout)

defs.name: text
defs.docs: Text to render, rendered next to one another according the layout.
